S.FORM: alang snuwing ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Nin'ay go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 364 buwan, 1,246 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 93 kyan ku 1,156 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 7 kyan ku 90 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Setik 76 , Tayan1 3 , Bunun 2 , Amis 1 . maki qu ngasal bziran ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na snuwing hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na snuwing hya' ga gyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na snuwing hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na snuwing hya' ga gyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na snuwing hya' ga paran. tay 'llaw na snuwing hya' ga bwarung. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
